inclusion.criterion: nutrition via gastrostomy, naso-gastric or jejunostomy enteral feeding system
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: patients with supplemental oral intake, but primary nutrition via gastrostomy/jejunostomy tube
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: not currently on antibiotic therapy and no antibiotics within 10 days
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: patient is negative for Clostridium difficile antigen in screen
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: patient, guardian or health care agent willing to give informed consent
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: patients who will only receive vancomycin, linezolid, or metronidazole as the antibiotic treatment
exclusion.label: not_met
